name: fiber-fault
title: Fiber Fault Simulator
description: An interactive tool to simulate and troubleshoot fiber optic cable faults.

name: router-simulator
title: Router Placement Simulator
description: Simulate optimal router placement for WiFi coverage.

name: mac-address-explorer
title: MAC Address Explorer
description: Explore the structure and meaning of MAC address bytes.

name: channel-overlap-visualizer
title: Channel Overlap Visualizer
description: Visualize 2.4GHz and 5GHz WiFi channel overlap and interference.

name: packet-loss-analyzer
title: Packet Loss Analyzer
description: Simulate and analyze the impact of packet loss on network performance.

name: traceroute-simulator
title: Traceroute Simulator
description: Simulate traceroute paths and common network issues like latency and packet loss.

name: command-builder
title: Command Builder Sandbox
description: Interactive tool to learn and practice command-line network diagnostic tools.
